Title: Culture, Knowledge and Power: What the Conservatives have Learnt from E.D. Hirsch
Abstract: © 2017 The Author(s). Published by Informa UK Limited, trading as Taylor & Francis Group.British Conservatives happily acknowledge the debt that they owe to E.D. Hirsch. To understand the nature of their curricular project, and how it is located within the wider goals of education and social policy, we need to attend carefully to the character of this transatlantic borrowing. Its emphases and omissions reveal much about the exclusionary reimagining of national identity that informs the continuing counter-revolution in education.
